title: Sci-Fi Energy Weapons Sound Effects Pack
description: Explore a distinctive assortment of sound effects for futuristic, modern, and sci-fi weaponry.
longDescription:
Listen to the audio preview > HERE

Check out the video preview > HERE


Sci-Fi Energy Weapons is a complete arsenal of futuristic, modern and sci-fi weaponry. We approach this collection with both a highly experimental and practical touch. Further, we aim to give you source material from real-world objects as well as synthesized sounds to design your unique ideas and a variety of fully designed energy weapons for use in your games.


After months of development and countless source recording and editing sessions, these highly practical and ultra-modern energy weapons are perfect for futuristic machine pistols, small or medium-sized handguns, rifles, shotguns, carbines and big launchers.


What's Inside

  • 655 Designed Sounds
  • 441 Source Sounds
  • 033 Plasma Weapon Shots (5 variants, 165 files)
  • 038 Pulse Weapon Shots (5 variants, 190 files)
  • 020 Plasma Recharge/Reloads (3 variants, 60 files)
  • 020 Pulse Recharge/Reloads (3 variants, 60 files)
  • 020 Compact Recharge/Reloads (3 variants, 60 files)
  • 020 Plasma Fly By/Projectiles (3 variants, 60 files)
  • 020 Pulse Fly By/Projectiles (3 variants, 60 files)
  • 137 Charge Up Sounds
  • 131 Robotic Morphs
  • 066 Mech Processed Sounds
  • 024 Robotic Glitches
  • 083 Synthetic Whooshes


Multiple Variations

We made many versions of each sound to ensure versatility and variety in sound programming. The sounds may sound alike at first glance but have slightly different pitch, duration and position. As a result, you get a satisfactory realistic experience.


Creative Freedom

All our sounds have been meticulously created to be 100% dry, without any application of reverb. Our ultimate goal is to empower you with the complete freedom and endless possibilities to craft your own distinctive masterpieces, without any limitations or boundaries. We aim to enable you to unleash your creativity and imagination to the fullest extent. Our dry sounds serve as a canvas for you to give life to your vision.


Drag-and-Drop Ready

Our extensive collection of high-quality sounds has been pre-mixed and mastered with the utmost attention to detail, ensuring that they meet industry-leading quality. This means that you can easily incorporate them into your project without the need for any further edits. With a simple drag and drop, you can effortlessly integrate these sounds into your production, saving you time and effort while maintaining the desired level of excellence.


UCS Compliant and detailed Metadata embedded

Sci-Fi Energy Weapons is fully universal category system (UCS) compliant. Additionally, to optimize your workflow and enhance productivity, our audio files are equipped with detailed metadata, allowing you to locate and access the sounds you require easily. Leading audio management software such as Soundminer and BaseHead are fully equipped to read and process the metadata, providing an intuitive and seamless user experience.

technicalDetails:
Number of sound effects: 1096 royalty-free sounds in total.

Audio file types: wav

Sample rate: 44.1 kHz

Bit depth: 16-bit

Loopable: No

Additional: Stereo format

Total Minutes of Audio: Approx. 45 minutes

Target Platform: All

Important/Additional Notes: No
